title: "IIT Madras working on AI solution for text to speech translation of Indian languages: V Kamakoti"
excerpt: "IIT Madras director V Kamakoti said that researchers working at the Nilekani Centre at AI4Bharat have developed a 9-language text to text translator, and that they are working on converting translated text into speech."
